(UNITURN mérőállomás doboz fedlap 2)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap_2.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap_2.txt -t -p)
(szerszám beállítás)

t2 m d2 h19

safe0,0,3

yxz

(1.menet)

t2
s50
f600

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

emax0.010

fmax900
fmin400
fratio0.6

pre_mill_steps2

ox =  0.05

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)
ma = 12.05

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

hx = 63
hx = add($hx,$ox)
hy = 30

c1 = 0.020 #furatok
c2 = 0.080 #keret

z2 = 3

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

hx1 = 45
hx1 = add($hx1,$ox)

h $hx1,18 z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2 ng
h $hx,$hy d3 z$z2 c$c1 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my  z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c1 d3 m1




(2. menet)

t2

f900

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

c2 = 0.1
z2 = 4
j1 = 0.4

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1
